description: This version of the  Person Facepalming emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on
apple_vendor_description: The person facepalming emoji on Apple devices presents a figure with a medium-light skin tone, their hand gently pressed against their forehead with a slight curve. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a subtle sense of exasperation or disbelief, with soft rounded edges ensuring a friendly and approachable appearance. This emoji effectively communicates moments of frustration, embarrassment, or the realization of a silly mistake.
